entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 7:51 PM CDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17 with temperature falling to minus 22 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming north 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 17 with temperature falling to minus 22 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 7:51 PM CDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25 with temperature rising to minus 21 by morning.
